title: Mephistopheles: An Escape Room
description: An Escape Room to foster creativity among students. Participants solve intricate puzzles and decode messages to escape from the clutches of a self-aware AI. It is a blend of mystery and technical skills.

title: Blitzbanter (Tech Debate)
description: Blitzbanter event description.

title: IPL Auction
description: Round 1 - In the first stage all the teams will compete in an IPL based quiz with the top 20 teams being promoted to the next round.

Round 2 - In this round, there will be a Higher-Lower game based on the stats of players in IPL T20 2023 matches. After this round, the top 10 teams will advance to the next round. Each question in this round will have images and names of 2 cricket players, along with a specific stat of one player. Then, the teams will have to guess whether that particular unknown stat of the second player is higher or lower.

Round 3 - Auction: Each team will be given a purse balance of 100cr, with which they have to build a team of 15-17 players from a designated pool of 160 players. Each player is assigned a rating based on their stats in IPL T20 matches in 2023. Teams with the highest ratings in their starting 11 will be crowned champions.

title: Arduino Arcade Bash
description: Onboard into a comprehensive two-round program that seamlessly blends education and competition. Participants partake in an immersive workshop, delving into the intricacies of Arduino-based arcade game development. Covering coding, hardware integration, and game design, this session equips attendees with essential skills. In the Challenge phase unfolds, tasking participants with crafting innovative games. Adjudicated on creativity, functionality, and user engagement, projects are evaluated by discerning judges. This event promises a professional platform for skill enhancement, collaboration, and the showcase of ingenuity in the realm of Arduino game development.

title: Techy Showdown: Mastering the Digital Arena
description: Techy Showdown is a venue for tech enthusiasts to showcase their technological and marketing skills. The competition aims to identify all-rounders in the technology field by testing participants' knowledge across a wide array of disciplines. Contestants engage in rounds of debate, technical showdowns, group discussions, and presentations to validate their points and demonstrate their expertise

title: Scenius 2.0
description: Scenius 2.0 presents an engaging technical game featuring four rounds centered around general knowledge in the field of civil engineering. Participants will embark on a journey that includes rounds such as JAM and Bridge Bust, where they will challenge their skills by constructing a bridge. This immersive event culminates in a virtual reality experience. Immerse yourself in breathtaking virtual worlds, from heart-pounding adventures to serene escapes. Feel the rush of excitement as reality blurs, and your senses are transported to new dimensions. We extend a warm invitation to participants from all engineering branches to partake in this thrilling competition, fostering collaboration and innovation.

title: Galactic Gaze: Astronomy Telescope Seminar and Night Sky Exploration
description: 'Galactic Gaze' event description.

title: Create with an E (E-Waste Art Gallery Competition)
description: E-waste will be distributed to participating teams, challenging them to harness their creativity to transform these discarded materials into an innovative and aesthetically pleasing art gallery. This event not only serves as a platform for artistic expression but also promotes sustainable practices by repurposing e-waste.

title: Sculptoria (3D Printing and rapid prototyping)
description: Join us for an exciting workshop called Sculptoria, hosted by the STEAG Centre at RSET, where you'll get hands-on experience with 3D printing, laser cutting, and CNC machines. Discover the basics of these cool technologies, create your own 3D-printed objects, design intricate patterns with laser cutting, and explore the precision of CNC machining. Our experts will guide you through the process, and you'll learn about how these technologies are used in real-world applications. Whether you're a beginner or an enthusiast, Sculptoria is the place to unleash your creativity and gain valuable skills in the fascinating world of digital fabrication. Don't miss out on this unique opportunity where innovation meets hands-on fun!

title: Metaverse Marvels - Embracing Web3 Revolution
description: Explore the future of the internet and immerse yourself in the Metaverse Marvels event. Embrace the Web3 revolution as we delve into the latest advancements in decentralized technologies, blockchain, and virtual reality. Join us for insightful discussions, hands-on experiences, and a glimpse into the evolving landscape of the digital world. Be a part of this transformative journey and discover the endless possibilities that the Metaverse holds.

title: Circuit Race
description: The Circuit Race event evaluates the ability of participants to design and implement a circuit using the components provided by the organizers. The event comprises a quiz round and an implementation round. Each team comprises 3 members with a prize pool of Rs. 2250.

title: Maestro de circuito
description: Maestro De Circuito serves as the ultimate arena where teams showcase their electronics expertise through competitive challenges. These tasks assess their knowledge and application capabilities, with the top-performing teams advancing through rounds. The team that successfully completes the final challenge wins.
